title: What war are we really fighting?
content:
What war are we really fighting?[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]

WIPE OUT BUSH! WIPE OUT HOWARD!

title: Re: What war are we really fighting?
Re: What war are we really fighting?
content: "War on Terror" sounds rather oxymoronical to me. War IS terror. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: Re: What war are we really fighting?
content: Well, I'd assume it's all about rich countries and people wanting to keep their position, goodies, and luxury. Fighting agains the "threat of terrorism" ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] ) and protecting the "human rights" ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] ) is just an excuse for us to make the things be what we want them to be.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: What war are we really fighting?
content:
It's basically always: War on people who have different beliefs and different values.
I think that's the case in every single war, but feel free to correct me if I'm wrong.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
